panels.description: instance's status from Exporter point of view.
panels.title: Status

panels.description: SQL Server committed virtual memory size.
panels.title: Virtual Memory

targets.expr: sum without(state) (mssql_os_memory_bytes{host=~"$host", dbinstance=~"$dbinstance", state="available"}) / sum without(state) (mssql_os_memory_bytes{host=~"$host", dbinstance=~"$dbinstance", state="total"})

sum without(state) (mssql_os_page_file_bytes{host=~"$host", dbinstance=~"$dbinstance", state="available"}) /
sum without(state) (mssql_os_page_file_bytes{host=~"$host", dbinstance=~"$dbinstance", state="total"})

clamp_max( ( sum without(type) (mssql_buffer_cache_hit_ratio{host=~"$host", dbinstance=~"$dbinstance", type="hit"}) / sum without(type) (mssql_buffer_cache_hit_ratio{host=~"$host", dbinstance=~"$dbinstance", type="tot_req"})), 1) * 100
sum by( application, host, dbinstance, db) (mssql_database_filesize_bytes{host=~"$host", dbinstance=~"$dbinstance", db=~"$database"})
sum by( application, host, dbinstance, db) (mssql_database_filesize_bytes{host=~"$host", dbinstance=~"$dbinstance", db=~"$database"})
count by( application, host, dbinstance, db) (mssql_database_filesize_bytes{host=~"$host", dbinstance=~"$dbinstance", db=~"$database", type="1"})
count by( application, host, dbinstance, db) (mssql_database_filesize_bytes{host=~"$host", dbinstance=~"$dbinstance", db=~"$database", type="0"})
sum by( application, host, dbinstance, db) (mssql_log_growths{host=~"$host", dbinstance=~"$dbinstance", db=~"$database"})
sum by( application, host, dbinstance, db) (mssql_connections{host=~"$host", dbinstance=~"$dbinstance", db=~"$database"})
sum by( application, host, dbinstance, db) (rate (mssql_io_stall_seconds{host=~"$host", dbinstance=~"$dbinstance", db=~"$database", operation="read"}[2m]))
sum by( application, host, dbinstance, db) (rate (mssql_io_stall_seconds{host=~"$host", dbinstance=~"$dbinstance", db=~"$database", operation="write"}[2m]))
